title: 美國海軍第七艦隊旗艦「藍嶺號」訪港

replies.msg:
USS Blue Ridge (LCC 19) and U.S. 7th Fleet embarked staff arrived in Hong Kong for a port visit. During their visit they will engage the local culture, and build relationships through music and public service activities throughout Hong Kong.
#USNavy #US7thFleet
Source: U.S. 7th Fleet Facebook & Twitter

好似唔多見新聞有賣
